p: The necessary physical distancing policies are likely to negatively affect active case finding as well as community-based activities which are important to manage TB (and HIV) in high TB burden countries [ 216]. However, they may reduce transmission of TB, which has already been shown for influenza [ 217, 218]. Both clinical and programmatic approaches to TB treatment are also affected in high-burden countries and drug procurement (particularly for second-line drugs) is also likely to suffer.
